content:
Stanford Court’s Corporate Preferred Program offers business travelers select rates for small to mid-size businesses. Business Travel made easy with access to exclusive offers. Our Corporate Travelers enjoy the following perks:

  • Late Checkout – based on availability
  • Preferred Rates 
  • Complimentary business services including printing & faxing
  • Complimentary Wifi
  • Complimentary welcome drink 

Complete the online form and one of our sales members will be in touch to qualify your company and get you started. In order to qualify we require a 50 room night minimum a year.  Once you enroll start saving immediately using your own company rate code. For further questions or information email us at sales@stanfordcourt.com.
